upgrades.changelog:
Includes firmware versions: 1.0, 1.10, 1.30, 1.40, 1.50, 1.60, 1.70, 1.80.
* Fixed a bug: The parent (root) device will update its state correctly now on select platforms.
* Fixed a bug: Solved an issue with the external switch not triggering the load in some edge cases.
* Fixed an issue with the connected load flickering on occasion.
* Added parameter 13: Separate the input from the output.

Includes firmware versions: 1.0, 1.10, 1.30, 1.40, 1.50, 1.60, 1.70.
*  Removed the delay when controlling the ZEN51 from the external mechanical switch when parameter 12 is set to value 0.

Includes firmware versions: 1.0, 1.10, 1.30, 1.40, 1.50, 1.60, 1.70.
*  Removed the delay when controlling the ZEN51 from the external mechanical switch when parameter 12 is set to value 0.
